communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: "Report an Incident" Data
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. All "Report an Incident" data related to cannabis retail shops, licensing, and the Cannabis Social Equity Fund for the year 2023.

2. Documents outlining the licensing processes for cannabis retail shops, including the issuance of "conditional adult-use retail dispensary" licenses or "CAURDs."

3. Lawsuits filed against New York State's cannabis legalization and regulation efforts, as mentioned in the Times Union article dated Sep. 6, 2023.

Given the public interest in understanding how taxpayer funds are being used and the legal challenges that the state is facing, I request that the fees for this request be waived. If that is not possible, please inform me of any charges in advance.

Due to the time-sensitive nature of this information and its importance to ongoing public debates and legal challenges, I request that this FOIL request be expedited.

If the requested documents are stored in multiple locations or some parts of the request will take longer to fulfill, I request a rolling release of information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jackson Parker

communications.subject: CUSTOMER - New Customer Welcome Message
communications.communication:
Dear Jackson Parker, 
 
Thank you for registering with the NYS Office of Cannabis Management FOIL Records Center.  If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you. 
 
Once your email address has been verified, you can log into the FOIL Records Center to update any contact or password information.  You will so be able to monitor and track the progress the of your request and receive most responsive documents. 
 Your Login ID is:  151678-08848838@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HSqyEZVT21hnud-2B6GvJwQ8QhlCX2S9bNsoBuaHnn1mVoyX7ajKQ0FV-2FtZr-2FDzEyLsfK8DikxN1mFtdoDxtCaLf0-3Dlihw_S8y-2Fb3a-2FMJ-2BUIJAe6TSQaj1iNvMwh1EByGPjquM35n-2FBfsRs2TM81AxHQmBPiNfgbx0-2FZjtloNEAuCLmoGAxZtxyTin-2FDZ1MrPB-2BxU7FN-2FAVRE1pvCLtSIFcXV5ChfxYBfaORtakvxoxZDYA4WFMrtw2qJ8d9NSsmpsRA1iwP46RMRic9JcjAcq6L17jCQK26LpOLvXifzaOHVV-2FokUkIIVSxSBdExKTlx3jheKgkAo-3D) 
 
Please login to "My Records Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY

communications.subject: FOIL Records Request :: R000326-090623
communications.communication:
Dear Jackson Parker: 
This message acknowledges receipt of your request. Your request was received in this office on 9/6/2023 and given the reference number R000326-090623 for tracking purposes. 
Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. All "Report an Incident" data related to cannabis retail shops, licensing, and the Cannabis Social Equity Fund for the year 2023.

2. Documents outlining the licensing processes for cannabis retail shops, including the issuance of "conditional adult-use retail dispensary" licenses or "CAURDs."

3. Lawsuits filed against New York State's cannabis legalization and regulation efforts, as mentioned in the Times Union article dated Sep. 6, 2023.

Given the public interest in understanding how taxpayer funds are being used and the legal challenges that the state is facing, I request that the fees for this request be waived. If that is not possible, please inform me of any charges in advance.

Due to the time-sensitive nature of this information and its importance to ongoing public debates and legal challenges, I request that this FOIL request be expedited.

If the requested documents are stored in multiple locations or some parts of the request will take longer to fulfill, I request a rolling release of information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jackson Parker

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Foffice-of-cannabis-management-new-york-state-28865%252Freport-an-incident-data-151678%252F%253Femail%253Dfoil%252540ocm.ny.gov&url_auth_token=AAEc6y3WeGE18Qvrc3pFp_f8uI8%3A1qe5QH%3Ao4CJxmvL1RZy88vlVSDp3XqQvCj6f8He7KllmoLjyr0

You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
New York State Office of Cannabis Management Records Access Office

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Records on Fentanyl-laced Cannabis
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

I hereby request access to and copies of any records in possession of OCM mentioning or describing the existence of cannabis laced with fentanyl or which warns about cannabis laced with fentanyl.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jackson Parker
